name: BAD WITCH
description:
Branded as a traitor and hunted by her former brothers and sisters, Kyridra seeks to sever her ties from her dark master, Paimon. With the Scroll of Bluefire in hand and the drums of Paimon's band beating ever deeper under the pale Louisiana sky, she ventures deep into an isolated bayou.

It's time for her to prove that she's the baddest witch around.

"BAD WITCH" was created for the E1M1 Magazine game jam using Raycasting Game Maker v.4.6.2, as per the jam requirements. 

IMPORTANT: If you’re having mouse issues when running "BAD WITCH", right-click the game application in your file explorer, navigate to compatibility and select Change High DPI Settings. In this menu, override the high DPI scaling behavior.
